data.actual_result: Discord detects me as playing the game which I got notifications from
data.expected_result: Discord should not be detecting a game that I'm not playing even if I am receiving notifications from it
data.short_description: If you receive a notification from a game that you're not playing, Discord's game detection will think you're playing it
data.steps_to_repro: - Close all games currently open on your phone - Wait to receive a notification from a game (I got one from FFRK for example) - Check your Discord Game Detection Service - It says I am currently playing a game (FFRK in my case) even though I don't have it open
